\textbf{Bayesian Modeling of Yield–Nitrogen Responses Using On-Farm Experiment Data (2022–2025)}
\vspace{-4pt}
\begin{itemize}[left=1.5mm, itemsep=1pt, topsep=0pt]
\item  Developed ML and Bayesian models using >500k OFPE observations to characterize yield–nitrogen response heterogeneity.
\item  Identified limits of tree-based models under sparse covariates; introduced timing-specific weather to proxy soil–water–N dynamics.
\item Advanced Bayesian curve-feature models (plateau, steepness, curvature) to quantify timing effects.
\item Applied shrinkage priors and pooling to support nitrogen decision-making under limited field-year data.

\end{itemize}
\vspace{-2pt}

\textbf{Producer Input Decisions Under Weather and Price Uncertainty (Behavioral and Causal Analysis)}
\vspace{-4pt}
\begin{itemize}[left=1.5mm, itemsep=0pt, topsep=1pt]
\item Studied fertilizer input adjustments under weather and price volatility using behavioral elasticity models.
\item Built uncertainty-aware decision frameworks identifying strategies robust to volatile environments.
\item Designed econometric models connecting individual adjustments to system-level behavior.
\end{itemize}

\textbf{Nitrogen Loss Measurement and Yield Impacts (Ongoing)}
\vspace{-4pt}
\begin{itemize}[left=1.5mm, itemsep=0pt, topsep=1pt]
\item Analyze real-time nitrogen-loss sensor data to quantify leaching dynamics.
\item Build time-series and spatial models linking N-loss patterns with weather events and soil conditions.
\item Develop an inference framework to evaluate yield and profit penalties associated with N-loss.
\end{itemize}
